title: Make the Master Elementalist Edition giftable
body:
Since Elementalist Lux came out, I've been planning on gifting a friend who is an avid Lux player the skin, and after purchasing 5000 rp to unlock it.

Once on the gifting page, I came disappointed that I can't gift the Master Elementalist bundle to my friend, especially since I would really like to see them play in-game with all the transformations this new skin has.

I would like to call out to Riot to make this available for more than just the said bundle, it'd be cool if we could purchase batches with the rp we buy as gifts for friends.

replies.body:
Since you're making a suggestion rather than asking for information or troubleshooting assistance, this post would be far better suited for the [**Miscellaneous Boards.**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous)

Let me know if you have any questions.
I concur. I had wanted to do the same for a friend of mine and ended disappointed.
